to connect: `ssh -i <path-to-private-key> <user_name>@<address>`
you can use remote-ssh  vscode extension by microsoft  with 12m download add your connection detail there.
group 1 instance is up and running. group 1 members please connect to your instance and reply back to this thread if it's not working.

group 2- 6 instances are not up yet.
